Modules

This page contains links to the lectures and materials. It is organized around the topics units in the course.

  • Linear Programming
    This unit introduces linear programming (LP) and covers the simplex method, sensitivity analysis, duality theory, and input-output analysis. Submit problem set on Canvas.

    • McCarl & Spreen Ch. 2‚Äì4

  • Unconstrained and Constrained Nonlinear Programming
    This unit introduces nonlinear programming (NLP) and covers both univariate and multivariate unconstrained and constrained optimization. Submit problem set on Canvas.      
    üìñ Readings:
    • Miranda & Fackler Ch. 3
    • McCarl & Spreen Ch. 12
    üìù Problem Set:
    • Problem Set 2
    Additional Materials:
    • MLE Surface
    • Portfolio Problem
    • Simulated Method of Moments
    • Bootstrap Example
